name: Chained (itch) (J3F3)
description:
Chained - adventure side scroller

by Warrick Pelser (Artist) & Jero Eyras (Programmer)

Scenario

You are linked to your partner and must escape the island. 

However, you can only control one character at once. 

 Hide behind obstacles to avoid the locals.

Controls

Arrow keys -> Jump & Left/Right Move 

Left Ctrl -> Switch Characters
